description: PerfMonitor2 (PM2) is a processor performance and monitoring tool. It allows to track up to 4 processor-related events choosen in a model-specific list. It succeeds to PerfMonitor, and in addition to that first version, PM2 includes monitoring data, like temperatures and powers.
summary: PerfMonitor2 (PM2) is a processor performance and monitoring tool.
author: CPUID
